replies.body: I feel like I should be worried.

This could mean a few things:

1. Teemo gets a new skin.
2. Teemo gets a ultimate skin.
3. A new champion that is related to Teemo.
4. Something else...

> This could mean a few things:
> 
> 1. Teemo gets a new skin.
> 2. Teemo gets a ultimate skin.
> 3. A new champion that is related to Teemo.
> 4. Something else...

Actually it's a new skin for Furgotten. Close guess though! :)
If anyone can detect sarcasm in the above sentence then congratulations you've won a koocie.
Never underestimate the power of the scouts code!

> I feel like I should be worried.

The hype is intensifying.

What if this is them foreshadowing a Teemo skin? MAYBE IT'S THE ULTIMATE SKIN AND THEY'RE ACTUALLY GONNA DO INFERNAL/SATAN TEEMO OMGGGG
{{summoner:14}} {{champion:17}} {{summoner:14}}
The most conflicting purchase ever made. Do I buy it or not? Although it will definitely be named Infernal since Satan is restricted in chat (no joke).
LOL I didn't know that! I can inagine Riot going all out on this, though. The voiceover would be hilarious
"Never underestimate the power ***OF YOUR SOUL!***"

**Sees a teemo*
Pulse quickening...
Vision blurring...
Rage taking control...
{{champion:150}}  GNAR! {{champion:150}}

* teemo shoots a blind rage dart at you from the bushes*
*missmissmissmiss*

Does this mean Teemo is next on the VU list?
Or maybe changing the Scuttle Crap so he doesn't pop all the shrooms that were just planted through the river?
haha...scuttle crap...
That was the point.

I was laughing because i've never seen someone call it that before :P and it is crap. I've missed nidalee spears that were leathal because of it just happening to walk in the way lol.

Oh and people abusing dragon with pink warding inside of the dragons hit box.
That one is annoying as shit too.. lol
Yes, the new crab walking over teemos shrooms causes them to go off.

hail hydra

i mean teemo
{{item:3074}} {{champion:17}} {{item:3074}} the new meta
go to hell teemo! Or should i say, go home?
Honestly, Teemo needs a rework. His kit is so boring. It's shrooms and his Q. Super boring kit. He needs a passive like Gnar where he turn into Satan and stabs people with a red trident.
Actually: I LOVE his kit.
this

A post about teemo, new game mode confirmed:

Hell Ride:

1vs100 
1: teemo
100: other playes

Teemo has no limit cap on  shrooms and has bÃ³nus 90%cdr on all skills and max level for teemo is 50. Have fun gg.
Teemo gets urf mode activated for only him, everyone else waits for somebody else to hit the shrooms first, and then they all realize that nobody is going to go first...

{{champion:17}} Teemo ultimate skin confirmed. Teemo will also be getting a VU. Teemo will also be getting a gamemode where both teams must play as Teemo and the mushrooms have a 1 second recharge time and you can hold an infinite amount and you are forced to place one where you are currently standing every second.

HUT two three four!
*I hate you more than before!*
 Five six seven eight!
*I hope you self-immolate!*

 Sound off!
*---- you!*
 Sound off!
 *Teemo!*

--Popular Yordle marching cadence.
OH GOD TEEMO IS HACKING INTO RIOT SERVERS

> "Hut, two, three, four."

Oh god, Please {{champion:17}}  Ultimate skin. Make his shrooms spikes!
No. Demonic/Satanic teemo please!

HAIL SATAN {{champion:17}} 


Teemo pls you are one of my favourite champs to this day, along with {{champion:27}} in what I like to call, Lets make your opponnet punch their moniter strategy

Teemo, Singed, Mundo, Morde, and Vlad: these are my main champions.

Even if im not very good, you have a hard time playing well while raging....so victory is mine.
Hardly see teemo anymore, he's busy replacing all the shrooms scuttle is popping.

Teemo buffed. Global taunt is now a passive on his R. If you hit a shroom, you will now hear Teemo's laugh on repeat for the rest of the game. Also, if Teemo enters your field of vision, you lose control of your champ and attack Teemo.

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Fury,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mG6fbraA,comment-id=0022,timestamp=2014-12-10T16:37:23.388+0000)
>
> Teemo buffed. Global taunt is now a passive on his R. If you hit a shroom, you will now hear Teemo's laugh on repeat for the rest of the game. Also, if Teemo enters your field of vision, you lose control of your champ and attack Teemo.

What buff? This already automatically occurs every game. You changed nothing!

Size means everything.

Luckily, Teemo is big where it counts.










...his heart.
(also his "Blowgun")
Teemo's heart is where Satan himself resides.
Riot FeelsU Satan's helper confirmed
Praise Teemo!
I reported u as a spam #noragrets.
this guy is an intern and an engineer... i don't think he has the sort of info that you guys are hoping he does

He's an engineer, so probably not a skin, but I do think this is a prelude to the publishing of his internship project...

FeelsU, I hope you made something awesome.
Please let it be something great. {{champion:17}} need more love since so many hate that furball.
The teemyo is coming for us all!
Can an intern do a rework?! The real question is, can an intern summon Satan?
Never underestimate the power of the Scout's code.

I'm worried for two reasons:

Teemo is the topic.

Rito Engineer comment.

I think, in a subtle and indirect way, we are being informed of a Teemo buff.

Can't wait until Gnar has been out for long enough that everyone regards him with the same hate they have for Teemo. He's basically AD Teemo and he's definitely just as annoying. If Teemo is Satan then Gnar is the Anti-Christ. May they both be removed from the client post-haste!
{{summoner:11}} {{champion:17}}
Get out of here with that Satanistic worshipping.
